src_original: ekakṣaṇābhisambuddhaṃ pūrṇāyāṃ niścalaṃ bhavet /  yadā vajramaṇau citaṃ tat sarvakṣaṇapūrakam // Sekoddeśa_106 //  na sthitiḥ śuklapakṣe 'sya gamanaṃ nāsite kvacit /
uṣṇīse hyudayo bhūyaḥ pūrṇā vajramaṇau punaḥ /
anyabhāvāntaraṃ sarvaṃ sṛṣṭisaṃhārahetukam // Sekoddeśa_110 //  bhavādgacchati nirvāṇaṃ tasmādeti punarbhavam /
svapakṣābhyāṃ yathāṃ candro 'yanābhyāṃ bhāskaro yathā // Sekoddeśa_111 //
dvyayutadvyaṣṭaśataiḥ śvāsairakṣarakṣaṇabhakṣitaiḥ // Sekoddeśa_112 //  pakṣadvayaṃ vyatikramya bhūmibhiḥ paripūritam /
ekārthamadvayaṃ dharmaṃ paramārthamavinaśvaram /  pūrṇāvasthāṃ gataṃ cittaṃ āsamantāt prapūritam // Sekoddeśa_115 //
